alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 1:56PM MDT until June 28 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTY... At 156 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Caputa, or 13 miles east of Rapid City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 143 pm MDT quarter sized hail was reported 5 miles east of Downtown Rapid City. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... New Underwood and Farmingdale. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 68 and 80. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
